attributes.action: allow catagory A licence holders to ride motorcycle based trikes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
currently only catagory B1 motorcycle licence holders i.e passed before 2000 can ride trikes with full licence entitlement those like me who passed after 2000 have a catagory A licence would need to do so on car provisionals with L plates! i wish to see the law changed to allow catagory A licence holders to ride at least bike based trikes with their full entitlement, as it stands car drivers with possibly no knowlege of how a motorcycle works can jump on a bike based trike and ride of when those with a full motorcycle licence cant, this is daft,
please sign this petiton maybe we can get this piece of nonsence changed!
